name: Speaker
description: Sound Quality: JBL speakers deliver rich and clear audio with powerful bass. For example, the JBL Charge 5 features an optimized long excursion driver, a separate tweeter, and dual JBL bass radiators, ensuring a big room sound even outdoors.

name: Television
description: Samsung TVs offer a range of advanced features, including AI upscaling, smart home integration, and a user-friendly interface, enhancing your viewing experience.Corporate discounts and benefits on QLED 4K, Smart, 8K, UHD, and Neo QLED TVs.
